doc:
Lenny Montana https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenny_Montana 0 Lenny Montana (born Leonardo Passafaro; March 13, 1926 – May 12, 1992) was an American actor who played the role of feared hitman Luca Brasi in The Godfather. Prior to becoming an actor, he had a successful career as a professional wrestler as well as an enforcer for the Colombo family. Lenny_Montana ( born Leonardo_Passafaro ; March_13_,_1926 – May_12_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor who played the_role of feared_hitman_Luca_Brasi in The_Godfather . Prior to becoming an_actor , he had a_successful_career as a_professional_wrestler as_well as an_enforcer for the_Colombo_family .
